Package model

Class Progenitor.Builder

java.lang.Object
model.Progenitor.Builder
Enclosing class:
Progenitor
public static class Progenitor.Builder extends Object
Builder pattern for the genetic algorithm containing default values

  • Constructor Details

    • Builder

      public Builder(Chromosome chromosome)
      Initializes the builder and defines its template chromosome
      Parameters:
      chromosome - Template chromosome used for filling the initial population. It also defines the length of all new chromosomes created by the algorithm.

  • Method Details

    • populationSize

      public Progenitor.Builder populationSize(int populationSize)
      Sets the number of chromosomes in each generation
      Parameters:
      populationSize - integer number of chromosomes, default 10
      Returns:
      the builder instance

    • endCondition

      public Progenitor.Builder endCondition(EndCondition endCondition)
      Sets the end condition for the genetic algorithm
      Parameters:
      endCondition - end condition, default EndCondition.MAX_GENERATIONS
      Returns:
      the builder instance

    • targetFitness

      public Progenitor.Builder targetFitness(double targetFitness)
      Sets the target fitness for the TARGET_FITNESS end condition
      Parameters:
      targetFitness - generation at which the algorithm stops, default Double.MAX_VALUE
      Returns:
      the builder instance

    • maxGenerations

      public Progenitor.Builder maxGenerations(int maxGenerations)
      Sets the max number of generations for the MAX_GENERATIONS end condition
      Parameters:
      maxGenerations - generation at which the algorithm stops, default 100
      Returns:
      the builder instance

    • crossoverMethod

      public Progenitor.Builder crossoverMethod(CrossoverMethod crossoverMethod)
      Sets the crossover method for creating new chromosomes
      Parameters:
      crossoverMethod - crossover method, default CrossoverMethod.ONE_POINT
      Returns:
      the builder instance

    • mutationProbability

      public Progenitor.Builder mutationProbability(double mutationProbability)
      Sets the probability for a chromosome's genes to undergo mutation
      Parameters:
      mutationProbability - mutation probability as a percentage between 0 and 1, default 0.01
      Returns:
      the builder instance

    • selectionMethod

      public Progenitor.Builder selectionMethod(SelectionMethod selectionMethod)
      Sets the selection method for choosing parent Chromosomes
      Parameters:
      selectionMethod - selection method, default SelectionMethod.RANK
      Returns:
      the builder instance

    • tournamentK

      public Progenitor.Builder tournamentK(int k)
      Sets the K for the tournament selection method
      Parameters:
      k - number of chromosomes entering a tournament between 1 and populationSize, default 1
      Returns:
      the builder instance

    • elitismCount

      public Progenitor.Builder elitismCount(int elitismCount)
      Sets the number of best chromosomes to be copied to new population without applying any genetic operators
      Parameters:
      elitismCount - number of elites between 0 and populationSize, default 0
      Returns:
      the builder instance

    • fitness

      public Progenitor.Builder fitness(Function<Chromosome,Double> fitness)
      Sets the fitness function for determining the best chromosome of a population
      Parameters:
      fitness - reference to a function taking a single Chromosome parameter and returning a double
      Returns:

    • build

      public Progenitor build()
      Builds and returns the final Progenitor object based on the provided parameters
      Returns:
      the fully constructed Progenitor object
